product.name: Mini Indoor Wireless WiFi Camera Small Home Security Cameras 2025 Tiny Body Small Outdoor Camara Micro Nanny Cam Pet Dog Babysitter House Security Camaras micro Door Room Cams No Need Wifi Camera
product.description:
How to connect?- Before you use it, please charge it.
1. Download APP on your mobile phone.
2. Open the software, and then add the camera device through the APP.
3. 2 connection ways: 1) AP Mode(no need wifi, suitable short distance. Applying for direct connect, named with BK** without password).2) IP Mode(Only support 2.4G, don't support 5G, applying for remote monitoring). The camera will auto be added Online. Connect to the home wifi and enter the password.
Note: Camera-router connection should be finished within 5 meters for strong singal.
No matter where you are, you can monitor your home/office/pet/baby via your smartphone app after the camera connected the WiFi. Perfect as a camera in Office, Home, and Car etc. Remotely view live video on your phone anytime, anywhere
Mini Wireless Security Camera Adopts quality 2.0MP image sensor with a free app, our camera can capture 1920x1080P and 2K Live Video at 25fps with high color reproduction. 120 degree wide angle lens offers a large view range to monitor your care. Perfect for housekeeper, nanny cam, baby camera, pet camera.
Commonly used for business and home security as well as baby monitor, toddler indoor camera, pet monitor camera and used for motion detection working to watch over elders. Remote Monitor with iOS, Android App. support 2.4G Wi-Fi only(not support 5G wifi.)
Compact and easy to carry, it fits in a pocket or backpack and can easily be placed in your home, office, store, corner of your car, or attached to any iron with a powerful magnet on the back. With the help of powerful magnets, you can place small security cameras on any surface. Perfect for protecting your home day and night. Report incorrect product information.
product.bullet_points:
• Spy camera hidden camera Ultra Clear Picture: outdoor security camera wireless outdoor wifi nanny camera. This mini-WiFi camera can check every event (compatible with 2.4GHz WiFi), so that you can know what is happening at home. Support iOS and Android devices.
• Spy cam WIFI real-time detection and night vision: Indoor security camera WiFi uses highly sensitive sensors indoors and outdoors. Once the camera detects the motion of an object and connects to the Internet, camaras photography motion alarm will be sent to your device AAP. 1080P high-definition camera lens and nano infrared LED lamp. It can reach 15 feet in a dark environment.
• Security Camera Spy Cam Hidden Cam: Wireless WiFi cameras and applications are easy to install. Indoor and outdoor cameras can choose to store the saved materials on the SD card. Just insert 8GB to 256GB cards (not included), they can work like ordinary cameras, and protect your home.
• Small Hidden security camera protects data and data storage: mini hidden spy camera multiple security protocols protect your data and privacy. Working options for continuous or motion detection. Micro SD card (need to be purchased separately). In addition, it has a 2.4GHz WiFI network. Download apps from the App Store or Google Play.
• Home Body Camera wireless wifi camera: This small home camera is wireless and battery-powered, which means you can place, stand or install it anywhere. You only need to connect the security camera wireless outdoor camera system to your router and open the APP to configure the camera in a few minutes.
